description: Located in Galapagar, in the foothills of the Sierra de Guadarrama, an environment constituted as a Natural Park, between Torrelodones and Galapagar is this fantastic 16-hectare farm in a Mediterranean forest with holm oak, ash and pine groves. Consisting of a main house and a secondary house in a privileged place with dreamy views, full of special corners and idyllic landscapes. Built and designed by the owners. The farm is fully enclosed by a stone wall and has three entrances, one to the main house, another to the parking lot for events and another entrance to the secondary house. The main house built as an old mansion with high ceilings with a palatial air, has two large entrances, kitchen, dining room, large main dining room, living room-library with fireplace, three bedrooms with bathroom, the main one of 60m2 with bathroom en suite and a loft of 200m2. You need rehabilitation. Secondary house on the farm of 103 m2 with 4 rooms to reform. It has a chicken coop and vegetable garden of 1.000m2 The farm has a magnificent pool area with bar, chill-out area, barbecue, shower and dressing rooms with incredible views. A 375m2 tent, an esplanade for events and a 2100m2 parking lot. License pending for them. The farm has a pasture area of 61.016m2; Wooded forest area of 89.333m2; unproductive area, where the houses are located, 9.279m2 and area of shrub pasture of 415m2.

description: Beautiful villa on a corner plot, very well preserved, where its luminosity, spaciousness of the rooms and well-kept garden stand out. ALLEGRO INMOBILIARIA is pleased to offer you this COZY and UNIQUE HOUSING, with the air of a MOUNTAIN CABIN located in the Northwest mountains of Madrid. Built on a BEAUTIFUL PLOT of 5,150m2 with SWIMMING POOL, TENNIS COURT, TANKS that collect rainwater for garden irrigation, stone house for various uses, the garden is like an ENCHANTED FOREST among large granite stones, pine trees, cistus and oaks. The house designed as a large cabin stands out for being lined with WARM materials such as WOOD and GRANITE stone.Its gabled ROOF stands out. The house is mainly developed on 2 floors although it is completed by the garage on the ground floor with a changing room and storage rooms and a LARGE OPEN ATTIC under the roof. On the first floor, after a LARGE PORCH with BEAUTIFUL VIEWS, we enter through a Hall from which we access the main LIVING ROOM with a seating area with WOOD-BURNING FIREPLACE, dining room and exit to another TERRACE.The KITCHEN has direct access to the garden and a service bedroom en suite, and Pantry.On this floor there is also the MAIN BEDROOM en suite and 2 other bedrooms with a shared bathroom. On the second floor there is another cozy LIVING ROOM with high ceilings, with a fireplace and a WONDERFUL TERRACE from which to enjoy the surroundings and views of the area.This floor also has another large suite with 2 rooms and a bathroom, and another bedroom also with a terrace. The house was built in 1968 and adapted to its new owners in 1988, the heating is electric, it has a septic tank. Community expenses €110/month and IBI €1,600 per year. The surroundings of the house invite you to walk and enjoy nature.

Live the dream of the Sierra in this luxury chalet with panoramic views! If you are looking for a unique, spacious and bright house, don't miss this opportunity. Casa Direct Inmobiliaria offers you this 350 m² independent villa in the Puerto de Galapagar urbanization, one of the most exclusive and quiet areas of the Sierra de Madrid, possibly with the best views in the area. This impressive property has a 1834 m² garden with century-old trees, a swimming pool with a removable hood cover where you can enjoy in total privacy the imposing views offered by its spectacular surroundings. Enjoy nature and fresh air without giving up comfort and design. The house is distributed over 3 floors with a modern and original style, connected by a designer flight of stairs. On the main floor is the living room with fireplace, which is connected to an office and a terrace, which is the heart of the house, closed with glass curtains, flooding the room with light. On the same floor is the kitchen, guest toilet, laundry room and closed garage for two cars. The upper floor leads us to a cinema room and the main bedroom with dressing room and en-suite bathroom. And on the semi-basement floor, a hallway leads to a huge bedroom with dressing room and en-suite bathroom, a cellar area and a separate guest apartment. The apartment is distributed in two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a large living room with kitchenette, pantry and full bathroom. This apartment has direct entrance from the outside of the house for greater privacy. The plot is equipped with a pergola with capacity for several cars, which is convenient for residents and visitors. In addition, the house has solar panels that will allow you to save energy and take care of the environment. I invite you to visit it… you will love it! This announcement is not binding and may contain errors. It is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual.

Attention! Don't miss this incredible opportunity to acquire a detached house for sale! Built in 1980, this property has a constructed area of 183m2, distributed on a single floor for greater comfort. Upon entering, you will be greeted by a charming L-shaped terrace, perfect for enjoying moments outdoors. In addition, you can enjoy delicious barbecues in the barbecue gazebo or relax by the pool. This home offers a half-finished extension, giving you the opportunity to customize it to your liking. In addition, it has a woodshed to keep the home warm during the winter months. The 1,260m2 plot will allow you to enjoy a large outdoor space, with access through a door to the garden. Inside, you will find a cozy living room with a fireplace and cassette player, perfect for family gatherings. The entrance hall has bright windows that fill the space with natural light. In addition, the property has three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a toilet, a complete bathroom with a shower. The kitchen is spacious and has space for a table, and the appliances are included in the sale. You will also find a glass room that functions as a second entrance to the home. In the garden, you can enjoy an ornamental well and a gazebo with an additional barbecue. The pool, surrounded by hedges, with a purifier to keep the water crystal clear. This property is well located, located halfway between Galapagar and Torrelodones. In addition, it offers the possibility of making improvements according to your needs. Don't miss this opportunity to acquire a perfect home for a family of 4-6 members!

description: Sánchez Rubio real estate, sells spectacular brand new newly built villas from €679,000 in Los Jarales (Galapagar). The location of this urbanization is in the northwest of Madrid, just 1.5km from La Colonia de Torrelodones and 3 km from the center of Galapagar. Urbanization is very well connected by bus to any point of interest, shopping areas, schools, clinics, universities, institutes and a very close train stop. Very bright independent villa of 231m2, on a 501m2 plot on two comfortable floors, has a large living-dining room, kitchen, three large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 full bathrooms, 1 toilet, optional pool and garage for 2 cars. The house has class A energy efficiency, and has the possibility of installing solar panels, aerothermal heating with refreshing underfloor heating, tilt-and-turn PVC windows and wooden carpentry. The urbanization has incredible common areas, consolidated garden areas, community pool. ! For more information do not hesitate to contact us! The development is made up of 28 new homes that will be built on a 20,742 m2 plot consolidated with various species of trees. 26 homes will be semi-detached and the other two will be independent villas. The residential complex will have bright homes with three and four bedrooms, surrounded by a very natural environment and equipped with maximum energy efficiency and sustainability. The residential complex offers common areas for the whole family, in an unparalleled enclave for its vegetation, with large natural garden areas and a community pool.
